text:
Jenna Dewan Tatum impressed viewers during Thursday's episode of Live with Kelly and Ryan.

The stunning dancer replaced Kelly Ripa while she takes a vacation, and Twitter users gushed about the stand-in.

Jenna looked stunning in a pale pink Lela Rose lace dress and Jimmy Choo black heels as she and Ryan Seacrest chatted back and forth about the day's hot topics.

Jenna Dewan Tatum received a lot of praise after her stint on the morning chat show with Ryan Seacrest. (Credit: Live with Kelly and Ryan)

Read more: Oprah Winfrey Reveals Exactly Why She Struggles To Accept Herself

But what most were amazed at was how Jenna knocked back a whole glass of whisky at 9 a.m.

And guess who challenged her? None other than Halle Berry!

Halle Berry was loving every second of it. (Credit: Live with Kelly and Ryan)

I can't believe she chugged that on TV... especially with over 30 minutes of air time still to get through. —TV Fan

A couple of weeks ago, Jenna's husband Channing Tatum dared Halle, 50, to also down a glass of the strong stuff during a Comic-Con event, to which she did in seconds.

Not being one to shy away, the 36-year-old World of Dance host chugged down the entire glass as Halle and Ryan sat there in shock.

Ryan, 42, turned to her and said, "By the way, I'm very impressed that with..." And then he was lost for words.

"I'm from Texas, so you learn these things pretty early on," the mom of one said.

She did it! Jenna fully accepted the challenge. (Credit: Live with Kelly and Ryan)

Go, Jenna!

Viewers at home loved it, too.

"I can't believe she chugged that on TV... especially with over 30 minutes of air time still to get through," said one.

Another wrote: "Love seeing you on #KellyandRyan You are amazing! Any GAL who CAN chug a drink at 9am is *priceless*."

Some even said that they would love if Jenna and Channing both hosted the show.

Read more: DWTS Star Julianne Hough And Hubby Brooks Laich Post STUNNING Honeymoon Snaps

Now, that would be great!
title: Fans Praise 'Live With Kelly And Ryan' Stand-In Host Jenna Dewan Tatum

og.title: Fans Praise 'Live With Kelly And Ryan' Stand-In Host Jenna Dewan Tatum
og.description: She proved just how awesome she is!
